question: ভাইয়া আপনি এত কিছু কই শিখছেন? অনলাইন পেইড কোর্স? Anisul Islam?  Offline?
reply:
Well, there's always YouTube for the starting point. YouTube has almost everything that you'll need. You just need to give some effort and be patient.
After a certain phase, you will hardly need to watch any tutorial. That's the time when you're confident in building stuff on your own.
